title: College Boy
lyrics:
[Intro]
Yeah (
You say, "What is it that you want?"
)
Ayy, check me out, man (
"You've got everything that a woman could ever need in life"
)
In case y'all niggas didn't know, shout out to the class of 2007 (
I've got a closet full of minks, chinchillas
)
St. John's University, stand up (Fayetteville State, nigga, 
I've got a bureau full of diamonds I can change four times a day if I want to
)
All my North Carolina A&T Aggies, stand up, UNCG, man
Carolina, NC State, Duke (
You're even tryin' to eat lobster and drink champagne, now you know that ain't your rule
)
Wake Forest, Winston-Salem State, man (Fayetteville Tech, 
'cause you strictly a collard greens and cornbread man
)
We gon' call this one "College Boy"
For all my college niggas, man (
Now you know if anybody know it, I know
, 
DJ OnPoint, J. Cole
)
For all y'all lil' niggas, uh, this is, this is why you should got to college, my nigga (
But since you feel like that this evening, sit down and drink some champagne with me and let me rap to you
)
Let's go
Yeah
[Verse 1]
It's hard to picture a nigga not gettin' money (Uh-huh)
J. Cole livin' bummy? Ha-ha-ha, that shit is funny
I'm focused on that cash, I just laugh at them bastards (Woo)
Eligible bachelor, finna get my bachelor's
And if this rap shit don't work, I'm goin' for my master's
Still scoutin' hoes on the first day of classes (Yup)
Keep up with the asses (Yup), keep up with the grades (Yup)
A nigga straight A's like the Braves
She got me in her dorm room, talkin' 'bout her room ain't clean
And she wanna fuck, but wait until her roommate leave
Now, I could give a damn if her roommate seen
'Cause if the girl get excited, she's invited (Ha)

[Chorus]
If it's alright with you (Yeah), shit, then it's alright with me
Yeah, and if it's alright with you, baby girl, then it's alright with me
Uh, and if it's alright with you shawty, then it's alright with me
Hey, and if it's alright with you (Yeah, yeah) then shit, then it's alright with me (Uh-huh, yeah, uh)
[Verse 2]
I hate to brag, well nah, I don't, the big man on campus
I got a chick in every class that give a nigga glances
And if your ass is dumb, you won't even get a chance
'Cause I got a chick in every class that give a nigga answers, yeah
And if I hit you, shawty, keep it on the low
This shit just like high school, the people wanna know
I see you haters mad, but I ain't mad at y'all niggas
We get ass like them basketball niggas, I'm ballin'
Got a sidekick so them hoes don't be callin'
Hit me on AIM, ayy, what's your screen name?
When I start typin' in, a nigga got some mean game (Yeah)
And when I whip it out, shit, you gon' think you seein' things, but
Back in Carolina, I miss home badly (Yeah)
It's funny, hoes I couldn't have is tryna bag me
But I'm in the G with this freaky-ass Aggie
She said she want it from the back, gladly
[Chorus]
If it's alright with you (Yeah), shit, then it's alright with me (Hey)
And if it's alright with you, baby girl, then it's alright with me
Uh, and if it's alright with you, shawty, then it's alright with me
Look, and if it's alright with you (Uh, yeah, yeah, yeah), you know it's alright with me (Yeah, uh)

[Verse 3]
I'm skippin' class just to get some ass, livin' fast
In college but don't sleep, nigga, my jab quick as Zab's
So kill that old college gangsta shit we don't believe
You mad 'cause your girl on Facebook pokin' me, so uh
You know the G, I hit her up like, "Hello, Elle
I seen you lookin' right the other day, LOL
So what's good with you?" She hit me right back like
"Shit, what's good with you?" You know I like that
So of course I write back, hit her with some nice chat
Same night, she in my room, lights off, I strike that
Yeah, the put game right, but that's your wife, nigga, take her
I bust, then I kick her ass out to write a paper (Yeah)
A nigga doin' homework
Drinkin' like a fish, it ain't a weekend that I'm sober
Fightin' hangovers on my way to my internship
And I forgot to study for my midterm, shit
[Outro]
Woo
Ayy, this is straight through, nigga
No, no fuckin', no double takes
This is straight through the whole shit, nigga
Check it out, man
I'm tryna tell y'all niggas, man, 
college is a good look
A real good look, my nigga
For more reasons than one, man
Know they try to keep us out of that shit, though
That shit like extra expensive
I got scholarships, though, so, uh, you know I'm not sweatin' that
But I feel for my niggas that couldn't make it, man
See y'all niggas
Ayy, Mike, we in there, baby
Ayy, they can't, ayy, they can't keep us out the G, my nigga, you know?
Then we all make it, nah, we ain't all make it
Shout out to my niggas, man, all my niggas, yo
Whether you graduated or not, whether you made it to college or not, nigga
Fayettenam, yeah, yeah
Class of 2007, man
, holla at me
I'm goin' to grad school, though, you know?
Hello?
What's up?
Oh, what's good, girl?
Oh, hi, you busy?
Yeah, I'm about to jump in the shower, but
Yo, who that?
Calm down, it's Gina, damn
Oh, tell her, "What up?"
Patrick says, "What's up?"
Alright
She said, "What's up, big ass?"
So we good for tonight?
Yeah, I'ma meet y'all around 9 at your place
Alright, cool, I'll see you later
Alright, girl, bye
Yo, fuck you tryna screen my calls?
